import React from 'react' import Todo from './Todo' import {AiFillEdit, AiFillDelete} from 'react-icons/ai' import {MdDone} from 'react-icons/md' type Props = { todo: Todo toggleCompletion: (id: string) => void editTodo: (id: string) => void deleteTodo: (id: string, list: Todo[]) => void } const SingleTodo = ({todo, toggleCompletion, editTodo, deleteTodo}: Props) => { return (
{todo.name}
) } export default SingleTodo
